title: Prenatal Nutrition Education: Video-Based Online Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nutrition principles and understanding of foundational teaching assistant roles
context.additional_context: Online training to enhance prenatal nutrition education competencies for educational assistants working in elementary and secondary schools, structured around video case studies and practical materials applicable to real-world settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain prenatal nutrition recommendations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze video cases to identify inappropriate instructional methods with 90% accuracy
Prenatal nutrition education can improve self-efficacy by over 30%
Learners can complete two topics per week using 3-minute-or-less microlearning modules in mobile environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
